account.information.title: Account information
account.information.description: Below are your addresses based on the account you're logged into.
account.information.tooltip: The addresses below are the same but in different formats. We provide this information for you to quickly refer to your address in instances like depositing assets into your account.

receive.format.hex: 0x format is only supported on EVM chains.

error.network.not.support.by-wallet.title: Unfortunately, with Metamask we currently only support sending from Evmos Network.

transfer.confirmation.message.successful: Your transaction has been processed on the blockchain.

transfer.confirmation.message.processing.description2: Meanwhile, you can track the transaction as below.

transfer.confirmation.message.taking.lon.description: It might take longer to retrieve the transaction,
transfer.confirmation.message.taking.lon.description2: you could track it on Mintscan or check your balance.
